title: Danielle Lloyd displays the astonishing results of her extensive surgery
text:
She has just put her body through an astonishing surgery overhaul.

So naturally, Danielle Lloyd is keen to display the fruits of her surgeon's labour as she glammed it up at the Vaporesso UK Launch party in Birmingham on Friday.

The Celebrity Big Brother star, 35, donned a skin-tight nude dress with a plunging neckline, spaghetti straps and chic ruching to show off the results of her breast augmentation, liposuction and a Brazilian bum lift.

Stunning: Danielle Lloyd is keen to display the fruits of her surgeon's labour as she glammed it up at the Vaporesso UK Launch party in Birmingham on Friday

Danielle looked incredible at the bash where she was sporting the sizzling gown which clung to every inch of her stunning frame.

Displaying a deeply bronzed tan, the light nude colour helped enhance her exotic look while she also boosted her height with sky-high heels.

In a bid to show off her striking good looks, the stunner slicked her hair into a tight ponytail which cascaded over one shoulder in a pretty style.

In true glamour girl style, her make-up was lavishly applied with a slick of gloss boosting her pout and heavy shadow and liner making her eyes pop.

Check me out! The Celebrity Big Brother star, 35, donned a skin-tight nude dress with a plunging neckline, spaghetti straps and chic ruching to show off the results of her breast augmentation, liposuction and a Brazilian bum lift

A vision: Danielle looked incredible at the bash where she was sporting the sizzling gown which clung to every inch of her stunning frame

Sizzling: Danielle worked as a glamour model for many years (pictured in 2007) and decided to return to the work after seeing her transformed figure

Proud family: Despite her transformation Danielle recently revealed that she and Michael still plan to try for a fifth child, as she is determined to have a baby girl

Danielle recently revealed that she decided to return to glamour modelling after cosmetic surgery made her feel 'womanly again.'

The mother-of-four told Closer magazine that after going under the knife, she feels happier and more confident than ever.

Later on, she took to Instagram to share a snap of her jaw-dropping figure and to discuss her procedures with fans, as she gushed about how 'amazing' her plastic surgeon made her feel the whole time.

Alongside a snap where she showed off her ample assets in white lingerie, she wrote: 'Where do I start... I just want to thank @comfortzonsurgery and my surgeon.

All the stars: She was joined on the night by glam Love Island beauty Tyne-Lexy Clarson

Elegant: Displaying a deeply bronzed tan, the light nude colour helped enhance her exotic look while she also boosted her height with sky-high heels

Hot stuff: Danielle was preening and posing while showing off her incredible new frame

'I’ve been through a rollercoaster ride in the past with surgery and I was scared but they made the experience amazing and now I feel the most confident I’ve ever felt.

'My surgeon will know how emotional I was when seeing my results for the first time I never gave them an easy job with my botched up boobs but they are now perfect and the scaring is unbelievable already. A million thank you’s.'

To Closer, Danielle went on to say that since her surgery she has set up an OnlyFans account to display her jaw-dropping physique, and her husband Micheal O'Neill fully supports her decision to overhaul her already stunning frame.

Results: Later on, Danielle showed off the results of her surgery as she took to Instagram to share a snap of her jaw-dropping figure while posing in white lingerie

New look: Danielle revealed that she decided to return to glamour modelling with an OnlyFans account (pictured) after cosmetic surgery made her feel 'womanly again'
description: The Celebrity Big Brother star, 35, donned a skin-tight nude dress with a plunging neckline, spaghetti straps and chic ruching
